nodes.description: 他转身朝我们走来，手里拿着藏在夹克里的枪。
nodes.support_text: He turned around and started coming towards us. He was holding his gun inside his jacket.

nodes.description: 他环顾四周，焦急地看是否有人会阻止他，然后走下自动扶梯。
nodes.support_text: He looked around anxiously to see if anyone was going to stop him and then went down the escalator.

nodes.description: 我们听到更多的枪声和另一声爆炸，然后一切结束了。
nodes.support_text: We heard some more gunfire and then another explosion, and then it was over.
